episodes.title: 'My Dad Wrote A Christmas Porno' TRAILER
episodes.summary: Cum all ye faithful! We've just released our special Christmas edition of Belinda's adventures all taking place at the Steele's Pots and Pans Office Party. It's out now and available to buy on iTunes (http://apple.co/2hEe9AU) and Acast (Android) now for £2.49 (a donation will go to the charity, The Eve Appeal eveappeal.org.uk And don't worry - this is a bonus and it won't affect the story. What story?!

episodes.title: S2E17 - 'A Hot Afternoon at the Lazy P Ranch'
episodes.summary: Will Belinda finally get her meeting with Jim? Have we seen the last of Hank Skank? Will we be reading book 3? Find out the answers to all of these questions as Belinda Blinked 2 reaches its sexy climax...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Michael Sheen
episodes.summary: Star of stage and screen (and general lovely man) Michael Sheen sits down with the gang to talk about his father's own unusual career and how he thinks Flintstone is the new Shakespeare...

episodes.title: S2E16 - 'A Bit Of Spaghetti Sauce'
episodes.summary: Still in Texas, Belinda is taken to an Italian restaurant by well-connected businessman, where things get very saucy over a bowl of Spaghetti Bolognese...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Inside Our Book
episodes.summary: We've finally got our hands on the first copies of our new book and it actually looks good! We have our first delve inside the pages...

episodes.title: S2E15 - 'Jim's Secret'
episodes.summary: It's the biggest cliffhanger since Ross said Rachel's name at the altar - what is between Jim Stirling's legs? The answer lies within  - and you'll never guess...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Charlotte Crosby
episodes.summary: Entrepreneur and reality star Charlotte Crosby is a real-life Belinda. She drops by to share some hilarious stories as well as her business tips for our heroine...

episodes.title: S2E14 - 'Texas, USA'
episodes.summary: Belinda and Bella touch down in Texas to secure a lucrative deal with Jim Stirling. But is he even there?

episodes.title: Footnotes: Dr Tamal Ray
episodes.summary: Dr Tamal (also, a finalist on last year's 'The Great British Bake Off') joins the gang to give a medical analysis of Belinda's activities.

episodes.title: S2E13 - 'Up, Up and Away'
episodes.summary: Bella and Belinda bump into Hazel, the co-pilot from Amsterdam, on a long haul flight to Texas. We can all guess what happens next...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Live Shows
episodes.summary: It's the very first Porno live shows this week in London and the gang try to overcome their nerves before hitting the stage...

episodes.title: S2E12 - 'The Fitting Bit'
episodes.summary: Before trying on their new expensive horse riding outfits, Belinda and Bella are given a unique 'while-u-wait' service by sales assistant Adaam...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Thomas Middleditch
episodes.summary: Emmy-nominated star of HBO's 'Silicon Valley' Thomas Middleditch chats to the gang about the tragic character of Belinda, tries out a few character voices and tells all about filming with Keanu Reeves...

episodes.title: S2E11 - 'Forsters of Knightsbridge, Dressage Outfitters To Royalty'
episodes.summary: Belinda and Bella go shopping and splash out on new horse riding outfits. But first, they need to get measured...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Twitter Roulette
episodes.summary: The gang read and respond to some of the tweets they've received about Book 2 so far...

episodes.title: S2E10 - 'Sir James Pops Up'
episodes.summary: It's Friday night and Belinda and her "glee team" are gossiping over drinks at the Pentra. But it isn't long before company chairman Sir James Godwin interrupts their evening for a bit of slap and tickle...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Rachel Bloom
episodes.summary: Creator and star of 'Crazy Ex-Girlfriend' Rachel Bloom talks us through her weird 'Belinda Blinked' theory and helps us put the wheels in motion for 'Belinda Blinked: The Musical'

episodes.title: S2E9 - 'Motivating The Sales Force'
episodes.summary: Less than an hour after she arrives back in London, there's HR issues for Belinda to deal with at the office. Obviously, she has her own unique approach...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Daisy Ridley
episodes.summary: The Force is strong with Belinda as 'Star Wars' actress Daisy Ridley joins the gang to chat about weird merchandise, who she'd play in the 'Belinda Blinked' movie and filming the upcoming Episode VIII...

episodes.title: S2E8 - 'Amsterdam To London Sky High'
episodes.summary: After an eventful night in Amsterdam, Belinda uses her flight back to London as an opportunity to join the Mile High Club...

episodes.title: Footnotes: No Such Thing As A Porno
episodes.summary: It's a podcast mash-up as the gang chat to Dan Schreiber from the hugely popular podcast 'No Such Thing As A Fish'. Dan guides us through facts about Amsterdam, the red light district and vodka. Who knows - you might actually learn something...

episodes.title: S2E7 - 'The Countess Zara'
episodes.summary: Belinda's bizarre night in Amsterdam continues as she meets Zara, The Countess of Leningrad...and also, it seems, the madam of a brothel.

episodes.title: Footnotes: Reddit
episodes.summary: The gang find an old Reddit thread that Rocky might have used for tips and inspiration for his own writing...

episodes.title: S2E6 - 'Casino Etoile, Amsterdam'
episodes.summary: The night is young(ish) for Belinda as she heads to an exclusive casino and encounters a potential new Russian client, Grigor Calanski...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Learning Dutch
episodes.summary: Want to learn some key Dutch phrases that will help you if you're ever planning a Belinda-style trip to Amsterdam? The gang are here to help...

episodes.title: S2E5 - 'Goedenavond Peter'
episodes.summary: It's the return of Peter Rouse as he becomes reacquainted with Belinda in his Amsterdam pad before taking her for dinner, where she gets a little too merry.

episodes.title: Footnotes: We've Got Mail
episodes.summary: The gang read through some of the emails from Belinda fans (aka Belinkers) with questions, concerns or weird stories about Book 2 so far...

episodes.title: S2E4 - 'Helga Turns It On'
episodes.summary: Dr Robbins' assistant Helga strips off her woollens and gets involved in the action with Belinda...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Joe Lycett
episodes.summary: Comedian Joe Lycett joins the gang to read the many and varied Amazon reviews for Belinda Blinked

episodes.title: S2E3 - 'The Dutchman's Leather Desk'
episodes.summary: Belinda gets to grips with Dr Robbins on his large red leather desk. However, it isn't long before he quickly reveals some bizarre sexual quirks...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Book Announcement
episodes.summary: Amazing news - Rocky Flintstone is going to be an actual published author! We're releasing a book this October and you can pre-order it NOW at bit.ly/MDWAP

episodes.title: S2E2 - 'Amsterdammmm'
episodes.summary: Belinda makes her first trip to Europe to secure a lucrative deal with Peter Rouse. Before she meets him, she encounters some new, interesting characters with their own sexual agendas...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Elijah Wood
episodes.summary: Hollywood actor (and self-proclaimed MDWAP fan) Elijah Wood chats to the gang about his favourite moments, the movie version and Rocky Flintstone's bright future

episodes.title: S2E1 - 'Ritz Spa Gossip'
episodes.summary: Belinda and the gang are BACK as they open 'Belinda Blinked 2'. This week, Giselle lets Belinda in on some sexy secrets as the girls treat themselves to a free spa treatment...

episodes.title: Best Of Book One
episodes.summary: Ahead of series two (starting on Monday 4th July), the gang get together to talk about some of their favourite moments from the now legendary 'Belinda Blinked 1'.

episodes.title: Footnotes: Rocky Q&A
episodes.summary: 'Footnotes' is all the extra bits we didn't have time for in the podcast. In this special edition, we put your questions to the author himself, Rocky Flintstone. PLUS there's a special sneak preview of book 2...

episodes.title: S1E13 - 'Monday Morning 7.45am'
episodes.summary: Revelations, announcements, endings - this episode has it all! It's the final chapter of 'Belinda Blinked 1'. Belinda enjoys one more session with The Duchess but will she make it to work for 9am?

episodes.title: Footnotes: Casting The Movie
episodes.summary: 'Footnotes' is all the extra bits we didn't have time for in the podcast. This week, we're deciding our A-list cast for 'Belinda Blinked: The Movie'...

episodes.title: S1E12 - 'The Duchess Comes Clean'
episodes.summary: It's the return of The Duchess in the penultimate chapter of 'Belinda Blinked'. What is she coming clean about? Will we find out? Will it make sense? Does it matter?

episodes.title: Footnotes: Merchandising
episodes.summary: 'Footnotes' is all the extra bits we didn't have time for in the podcast. This week, Rocky has sent an email with some interesting ideas for 'Belinda Blinked' merchandise...

episodes.title: S1E11 - 'The Night Receptionist'
episodes.summary: Belinda is still wide awake at The Horse and Jockey as the youngish man from reception brings her some extra special room service...

episodes.title: Footnotes: Rocky's Biography
episodes.summary: 'Footnotes' is all the extra bits we didn't have time for in the podcast. This week, we discover that Rocky has written himself a biography...

episodes.title: S1E10 - 'Sunday Night 11.55pm'
episodes.summary: Belinda and Peter continue their awkward dalliance in the lobby of 'The Horse and Jockey' in full view of the CCTV. And Peter reveals a shocking twist...

episodes.title: S1E9 - 'The Horse and Jockey'
episodes.summary: In what is becoming the longest day of her life, Belinda returns to The Horse and Jockey for dinner followed by a second dalliance with Peter Rouse...

episodes.title: S1E8 - 'The Chalet'
episodes.summary: As Belinda's day at the company party continues, the mysterious Duchess takes her to a nearby chalet where things get very racy...

episodes.title: S1E7 - 'The Tombola'
episodes.summary: This week Belinda is finally free from the maze and takes part in a charity tombola. But, as always, it's more than meets the eye. The prizes are much more racy...

episodes.title: S1E6 - 'The Third Client Peter Rouse'
episodes.summary: This week Belinda spends time with one more client in the medium sized maze. They seem to be getting on well - could this be love?

episodes.title: S1E5 - 'The Second Client Jim Stirling'
episodes.summary: This week Belinda is still in the maze and gets a little more (or should that be less?) than she bargained for with potential American client, Jim Stirling...

episodes.title: S1E4 - 'The Maze / The First Client'
episodes.summary: This week it's two chapters for the price of one! Belinda puts on her tennis gear (without bra or thong) as Tony leads her to a "medium-sized garden maze" to meet some prospective business clients.

episodes.title: S1E3 - 'The Regional Sales Meeting'
episodes.summary: This week, Belinda gets to grips with her UK wide sales team and a few after-work drinks at a hotel bar get a little out of control. One word - pomegranates...

episodes.title: S1E2 - 'The Leather Room'
episodes.summary: In this episode, Belinda discovers an unusual room in her office, lined, from floor to ceiling, in leather tiles.

episodes.title: S1E1 - 'The Job Interview'
episodes.summary: In the very first episode, we meet our heroine, Belinda Blumenthal, as she interviews for the job of her dreams - worldwide sales director of a pots and pans company.

episodes.title: My Dad Wrote A Porno - Series 1 Trailer
episodes.summary: Imagine if your Dad wrote a dirty book. Most people would try to ignore it and pretend it had never happened - but not Jamie Morton. Instead, he's decided to read it to the world in this brand new comedy podcast. With the help of his friends, James Cooper and BBC Radio 1's Alice Levine, Jamie will be reading a chapter a week and discovering more about his father than he ever bargained for.
